templates.label: Whether Non encumbrance certificate of the applied land from the competent authority submitted.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: Whether Indemnity bond indemnifying DTCP from any loss, if occurs due to any dispute on the applied land submitted.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: In case of colony where there is cap on NPA, whether application received within stipulated period of online window inviting applications.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: In case of colony where there is cap on NPA, whether application received within the prescribed NPA as per seniority list of the sector.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application under part migration/ migration, whether parent license renewed/requisite renewal fee + applicable interest deposited.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application for additional area, whether parent license renewed/requisite renewal fee + applicable interest deposited.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application for additional area,  status of EDC/SIDC dues in parent license.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application under part migration, whether land schedule of balance land of parent license submitted.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application under part migration, whether layout plan of balance land of parent license submitted.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license application under part migration, whether applicable scrutiny fee submitted for revision of layout plan of balance land of parent license.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license applied for additional area, whether applicable scrutiny fee for revision of layout plan submitted.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If license applied under migration or for additional area, then status of third party rights in parent license.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: If third party rights not created, then affidavit regarding non creation of third party rights and non RERA registration.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: Whether area norms getting fulfilled as per applicable policy.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

templates.label: Whether approach norms getting fulfilled as per applicable policy.
templates.name: OrignalShajraPlan

labels.label: b)Details of any other project developed in Real Estate.

labels.label: a)In case of company-
labels.name: company

labels.label: (i) Form PAS-3.

labels.label: (ii) Accumulated reserves and surpluses
labels.name: Accumulated reserves and surpluses

labels.label: (iii) Paid amount of fully convertible Debentures (into equity shares)
